alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:24AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lafayette, southern Jefferson, Taylor and south central Madison Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1124 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Perry, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Pinland, Jug Island, Buckville, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Howell Place, Chancey and Secotan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
